game.name: Galaxyz
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Insane destruction-focused sandbox space shooter. Blow up whatever you want with blasters and missiles, customize and upgrade your battle rig, join factions or lead your squad. Progress, grow stronger, and become a legend of the galaxy!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Insane destruction-focused sandbox space shooter. Blow up whatever you want with blasters and missiles, customize and upgrade your battle rig, join factions or lead your squad. Progress, grow stronger, and become a legend of the galaxy!
